price: Sọ pé: “Èmi kò mọ̀ bóyá ohun tí Wọ́n ń ṣe ní àdéhùn fún yín ti súnmọ́ tàbí Olúwa mi yóò fún un ní àkókò tó jìnnà.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul in adrī aqarībun mā tūʿadūna am yajʿalu lahu rabbī amadan
